desc: Check out the latest and most unique satin charmeuse fabric collections, from Paisleys to Tribals and Florals to Animal prints! Limited Unique designs printed in Los Angeles CA, Buy directly from a minority female owned USA company.

layout.text: Largest charmeuse satin prints selection on the web
From florals to paisleys and animal prints, you wont find these many choices in one place online. Locally outsourced and printed in Los Angeles, CA
